General.Name: Nueva Expresión Textil S.A.
General.Description: Nueva Expresión Textil, S.A. manufactures and sells fabrics and garments. It also offers jacquards, meshes, rib, lurex, stripes, simplex, and spacer fabrics. The company provides luxury garments; sports garments with seamless technology; swimwear; plain and printed intimate and shapewear with a knitted stitch or structure; and medical fabrics that help to delay and prevent medical procedures. The company was formerly known as Dogi International Fabrics, S.A. Nueva Expresión Textil, S.A. was founded in 1954 and is based in Madrid, Spain.
